column4: Hi - I don't have enough diskspace on the ubuntu filesystem to do any updates - but there is plenty of space on the windows partition - can I move any across?
Yes. Boot into the ubuntu live cd, find gparted in the System menu, and resize them however you like.
it's advisable to back up your data first though.
Sorry, it won't be called gparted in the menu. It'll be called "Partition Editor" or somehting like that.
